title: Tales of Terror (Eclipse)
description:
The Eclipse Comics Upload Project moves inexorably forward with 'Tales of Terror'!

'Tales of Terror' began in 1985 and ran for 13 issues. It was another one of Eclipse's anthology series and featured work from Stephen Bissette, Mark Wheatley, David Lloyd, Bruce Jones, John Bolton, Tim Truman and others.

This torrent contains all thirteen issues. Thank you creative teams! Thank you scanners! Get it, seed it!
